subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|心|alt1=忄|t1=heart|貫|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – habit is what one does by heart.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to be [[accustomed]] to; to be [[used]] to
# [[habit]]; [[custom]]
# [[habitually]]; [[usually]]
# to [[spoil]]; to [[overindulge]]
